meanings: [명사] improvement, advancement, progress, (formal) betterment, [동사] improve, advance, progress

vlive.korean: [혹시 햄버거에 깜찍함을 811% 정도 향상시켜주는 효능이 있는 건 아닐까...] 맛있어? [Maybe the hamburger makes people 881% cuter...] Is it good? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 이리노 보고 심장 쥐어뜯다가 심장에 납땜ing…💘 (LEE KNOW answering fans’ questions)
vlive.english: [Maybe the hamburger makes people 881% cuter...] Is it good?

vlive.korean: 피부의 탄력성을 향상 시켜서 그런 거죠. By increasing the skin's elasticity. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV

마스크는 피부 안 밖을 향상 시켜서 피부를 밝게 해줘요. The mask will work both inside and out to make your skin luminous. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV
vlive.english: The mask will work both inside and out to make your skin luminous.

vlive.korean: 실력이 향상됐으면 좋겠고요. to play the guitar better. 듣기 View video STARSHIP : [FULL] JEONG SEWOON DEBUT SHOWCASE
이게 집중력 향상에 도움이 되나요? Is it good to enhance concentration? 듣기 View video B.A.P : B.A.P Vring U (B.A.P 2000일 with BABY)
vlive.english: Is it good to enhance concentration?

examples.korean: Research has focused on improving the car’s aerodynamics. 발음듣기 연구는 자동차의 공력 특성을 향상시키는 데 초점을 두어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Research has focused on improving the car’s aerodynamics. 발음

examples.korean: The only way to improve is through hard work and dogged perseverance. 발음듣기 향상으로 나아가는 유일한 길은 근면과 불굴의 인내를 통하는 것뿐이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The only way to improve is through hard work and dogged perseverance. 발음

examples.korean: I need to improve my English. 발음듣기 나는 영어 실력을 향상시켜야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I need to improve my English. 발음

examples.korean: I need to improve my French. 발음듣기 나는 내 프랑스어 실력을 향상시켜야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I need to improve my French. 발음

examples.korean: a local campaign to improve road safety 발음듣기 도로 안전성 향상을 위한 지역 캠페인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a local campaign to improve road safety 발음
